statements: SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData;
SELECT id, user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT behavior_type, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, device_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE device_id = 3 AND behavior_type = 'click'
SELECT user_id, device_id, timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'submit' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, device_id, behavior_type, behavior_details FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-02-01' AND '2021-02-28'
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_behavior_count FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_type FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_type LIKE '%color%';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE device_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT u.username, d.device_type, d.manufacturer FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id;
SELECT u.username, up.preference_name, up.preference_value FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id;
SELECT d.model, u.username, up.preference_name FROM devices d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type='Smartphone' AND manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT user_id, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_category='Music';
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, timestamp FROM recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE os_version IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, preference_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT u.username, d.device_type, r.recommendation_type FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_timestamp FROM users u JOIN user_activities ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
